snippet: President Obama continued to keep abreast of developments in Ukraine and would most likely abandon his “recreational amenities,” should events become more volatile, a spokesman said.
abstract: President Obama and his family go to oceanfront resort in Key Largo, Fla, to begin a weekend getaway that was in doubt because of the tumultuous events in Crimea and Ukraine; White House says he is keeping close eye on the Ukraine crisis, getting briefed and placing calls to the leaders of Russia, Germany, Britain and Japan.
lead_paragraph: President Obama continued to keep abreast of developments in Ukraine and would most likely abandon his “recreational amenities,” should events become more volatile, a spokesman said.

headline.main: The President Does Not Drop Out of Sight, but Does Get Out of Town
headline.print_headline: The President Does Not Drop Out of Sight, but Does Get Out of Town
